settings.title: CAN I EASILY CANCEL OR PAUSE MY SUBSCRIPTION?
settings.text: Yes! You can skip, reschedule, edit, or cancel your deliveries at anytime by logging into your account page!

settings.title: WHAT IS THE CONCIERGE SERVICE?
settings.text: genucel promises to deliver a white glove customer service experience to complement its world class products. Our customer service team is available around the clock via SMS, phone, and e-mail to address your needs and personally suggest products that match your skin care goals.

settings.title: WHAT IS THE CONCIERGE CUSTOMER SUPPORT PHONE & TEXT NUMBER?
settings.text: To ask questions about your subscription, add or edit items, cancel a subscription, or as product related questions, please call or text 800-754-6211.

settings.title: WHAT IS INCLUDED IN THE COMPLIMENTARY SPA BOX?
settings.text: In your complimentary spa box, you will receive 2 travel size best sellers! (Limit 1 per order)

settings.title: HOW DO I RECEIVE MY 50% OFF FEATURED PRODUCT?
settings.text: Once per month, you will receive an email containing information on your exclusive offer. Your first email will be received within 30 days of initial purchase. Be sure to subscribe to our emails to ensure your offer is received!

settings.title: HOW DO I JOIN SUBSCRIBE & SAVE?
settings.text: Joining this program is easy, simply choose the Subscribe & Save option when on any product page and checkout. You will automatically be given all of these benefits after purchase!

settings.title: HOW DO I MAKE CHANGES TO MY SUBSCRIBE & SAVE ORDERS?
settings.text: To review or modify your Subscribe & Save order, simply visit the Subscription section after logging into your account on genucel.com

settings.title: Good for you
settings.text: We're cautious of our ingredient selection and use only the best.

settings.title: Made to perform
settings.text: Breakthrough formulas that are designed and tested thoroughly.

settings.title: 100% transparency
settings.text: We never test on animals during any stage of product development.
